net.proteusframework.ui.column

Interface DataColumn

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TableDataColumn, TreeDataColumn
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataColumn, FixedValueColumn, PropertyColumn

    public interface DataColumn
    Represents an MIWT column.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<?> getColumnClass()
      Gets the type of data contained in the column.
      TextSource getColumnName()
      Gets the name of the column.
      Comparator<?> getComparator()
      Gets the comparator for sorting this column.
      String getDisplayClass()
      Get an optional display class.
      Metric getMaximumWidth()
      Gets the maximum width the column requires.
      Metric getMinimumWidth()
      Gets the minimum width the column requires.

    • Method Detail

      • getColumnClass

        Class<?> getColumnClass()
        Gets the type of data contained in the column.
        Returns:
        the type. Never null.

      • getColumnName

        TextSource getColumnName()
        Gets the name of the column.
        Returns:
        the name. Never null.

      • getComparator

        Comparator<?> getComparator()
        Gets the comparator for sorting this column.
        Returns:
        the comparator.

      • getDisplayClass

        String getDisplayClass()
        Get an optional display class.
        Returns:
        the HTML class name or null.

      • getMaximumWidth

        Metric getMaximumWidth()
        Gets the maximum width the column requires.
        Returns:
        the width or null if not specified.

      • getMinimumWidth

        Metric getMinimumWidth()
        Gets the minimum width the column requires.
        Returns:
        the width or null if not specified.
